players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and knows who the mafioso is."
You: "I'm still not sure who the mafioso is, but Charlie's claim that he knows who it is seems suspicious. I'll keep an eye on him."
Charlie: "I will continue to investigate and gather more evidence. I won't jump to conclusions, but Charlie's claim might be a clue."
Diana: "Bob was a threat to us, and I'm the one who took care of him. Don't trust Charlie, he's trying to deceive you."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
